comment: Great professor, uses real life experience and his current business freely where applicable to the class. Semester long group project, but it was enjoyable to me and it forced me to learn a lot through the simulation game. Would Definitely recommend to others!
Awesome professor!!! Probably one of the best professor's I have had at KSU. He brings real world experience to the lectures. If you come to class, study and pay attention you will do well.
